title: RHEM  3  The  Secret  Library
description:
Title: RHEM 3: The Secret Library
Genre: adventure / puzzle-solving / 1st-person
Released: 21st October 2007
Developer: Knutt Mueller
Publisher: RuneSoft
Description:
The adventures of brothers Kales and Zetais continue in this fascinating first-person 3D adventure set in a labyrinthine world of hidden rooms and secret passages, strange vehicles and odd machines. In search of a powerful black gem, you uncover hints hidden in a secret library, and ponder clues offered by the peculiar inhabitants of the mysterious land of RHEM who assist you in your quest. With an adventurous spirit, logical thinking, and keen puzzle-solving, you will slowly but surely unearth the location of this curious treasure and unveil the secret it holds!

How to play:
1) Run rhem3_setup.exe and install the game;
2) Start the game using its main executable or shortcuts (DRM free).

! Notice
You need to have QuickTime installed to view the in-game cinematics. I've included QuickTime alternative with the game, you can install it by running QuickTime_Alternative_322.exe.


If you like the game, BUY it!
